mapper.select: WITH NOW_DAY AS (SELECT T.VDAY,T.JYS,T.JYSMC,T.JYSINFO,T.CPBM,T.CPMC,T.FVALUE FROM INSIGHT_SETTLEMENT_PRICE T WHERE T.JYSFL=1 AND T.VDAY=TO_CHAR(NOW()- INTERVAL'1 day','YYYYMMDD')), BEF_DAY AS (SELECT MAX(ISP.VDAY) AS VDAY,ISP.JYS,ISP.CPBM FROM INSIGHT_SETTLEMENT_PRICE ISP,NOW_DAY ND WHERE ISP.VDAY != TO_CHAR(NOW()- INTERVAL'1 day','YYYYMMDD') AND ISP.JYS=ND.JYS AND ISP.CPBM=ND.CPBM GROUP BY ISP.JYS,ISP.CPBM), BEF_DAY_INFO AS ( SELECT ISP.VDAY, ISP.JYS,ISP.JYSMC,ISP.JYSINFO,ISP.CPBM,ISP.CPMC,ISP.FVALUE FROM INSIGHT_SETTLEMENT_PRICE ISP,BEF_DAY BD WHERE ISP.VDAY=BD.VDAY AND ISP.JYS=BD.JYS AND ISP.CPBM=BD.CPBM) SELECT ND.CPMC,ND.CPBM AS CPDM,ND.JYS,ND.JYSMC,ND.JYSINFO,ND.FVALUE AS ZXJG, DECODE(BDI.FVALUE,0,0,ROUND((ND.FVALUE-BDI.FVALUE)/BDI.FVALUE *100,2)) AS BH FROM NOW_DAY ND,BEF_DAY_INFO BDI WHERE ND.JYS=BDI.JYS AND ND.CPBM=BDI.CPBM ORDER BY cpmc
